=================================================
 
Drama series presenting one of the untold stories of World War I. Kitty Trevelyan tries to put past troubles behind her as she joins two other girls to volunteer at one of the busy war hospitals in northern France. For the hospital workers it is a daily battle to patch the men up and keep the war machine churning. Staff numbers are low and the volunteers are desperately needed, yet there are some who see these women as more of a threat than a lifeline.
 
 
1/6 Three girls face a baptism of fire as they arrive at a British hospital in war-torn France 
 
2/6 A large convoy of wounded men brings challenges for the hospital staff. 
 
3/6 The hospital anticipates a patient's court martial, and Thomas and Joan face tough cases.
 
4/6 Kitty is shocked by a visitor from her past, and a group of patients pose a moral dilemma.
